name: Novoslavia (Rafal_Smietana)
description:
Created as part of Serious Games coursework at Glasgow Caledonian University.

Created by: Rafal Smietana, Preslav Petrov, Karen Bohlender, Sam McArthur-McLean

Novoslavia is a fictional Eastern Bloc country that has recently started taking its first steps towards adopting democracy. You assume the role of a young politician working for the country's conservative party that would like to seize more power and see the country go back to the way things were. As part of your job, you will have to vote on issues that will affect the citizens and the city around you. Some changes are instant and some will happen over time. But be careful! Voting too much in favor of one thing or another can bring the ire of the people or your party. Choose wisely.
